com.espertech.esper.ceppushsvc.client.config

Class BatchedService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.espertech.esper.ceppushsvc.client.config.QualityOfService
      • com.espertech.esper.ceppushsvc.client.config.BatchedService

  • public class BatchedService
extends QualityOfService
    Definition for a batch service that batches items until a release interval occurs or until a certain number of items has been batched, whichever comes first.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BatchedService()

      Sets the batch interval.

      • getCount

        public java.lang.Integer getCount()
        Returns the number of items to batch until the batch is released. Set to zero or a negative number to disable.
        Returns:
        number of items to batch

      • setCount

        public void setCount(java.lang.Integer count)
        Sets the number of items to batch until the batch is released. Set to zero or a negative number to disable.
        Parameters:
        count - number of items to batch
